job_description:
We are a highly motivated team, dedicated to delivering products and services that improve the customer experience when accessing internet video at the edges of the network. We are developing a set of inter-related technologies targeting businesses that offer Wi-Fi to their customers but which have limited bandwidth.

Netskrt offers the opportunity to obtain hands on experience with storage, networking, analytics, and cloud technologies. As part of the development team you will have the opportunity to design and implement solutions to solve challenging problems in a startup environment; working with accomplished engineers and a leadership team with a proven track history of success.

Key Responsibilities:
Be very hands-on; work as part of the engineering team on day-to-day development activities and implementation tasks. The ideal candidate for this position is an experienced full-stack software engineer who has discovered that developing the Front-end/UI is your passion. The objectives of this role about designing and creating engaging, easy to use Web application interfaces and dashboards; and excited by the possibilities of cloud scale software and big data solutions.

Required Qualifications:
Bachelor degree
5+ years professional experience working on data driven systems
Solid front end framework experience in ReactJS.
Solid experience in UI, UX and web services design and implementation
Solid understanding / implementation of responsive designs for desktop and mobile
Solid CSS3, HTML5, JavaScript and other front-end development skills
Deep understanding of object-oriented design
Hands on experience working in a Linux environment
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Excellent planning and organizational skills. Works well in pressure situations
Strong interest or knowledge of data visualization best practices and state of the art technologies
Prior experience in team leadership and building

Desired Qualifications
Experience in all or some of the following technologies and applications:
Cloud technologies (AWS, OpenStack)
Configuration/container management (Kubernetes)
Network switching and routing technologies
Experience with tiered storage solutions
Database technologies (PostGres, MySQL, MongoDB, RabbitMQ)
Experience with caching and CDN (content delivery network) technologies (Netflix, Amazon, Google, Limelight, Akamai, Fastly)
Data security (TLS/SSL and related ecosystems)
Big data analytics and advanced analytics (Hadoop, HBase, Spark, YARN)
